title: Wine
cleaned_text: - Do not drink wine, [Lev. 10:9](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/10.9?lang=eng#p9). - He shall separate himself from wine, [Num. 6:3](/study/scriptures/ot/num/6.3?lang=eng#p3). - Their wine is the poison of dragons, [Deut. 32:33](/study/scriptures/ot/deut/32.33?lang=eng#p33). - drink not wine nor strong drink, [Judg. 13:4](/study/scriptures/ot/judg/13.4?lang=eng#p4). - wine that maketh glad the heart, [Ps. 104:15](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/104.15?lang=eng#p15). - Wine is a mocker, [Prov. 20:1](/study/scriptures/ot/prov/20.1?lang=eng#p1). - he that loveth wine ... shall not be rich, [Prov. 21:17](/study/scriptures/ot/prov/21.17?lang=eng#p17). - They that tarry long at the wine, [Prov. 23:30](/study/scriptures/ot/prov/23.30?lang=eng#p30). - Look not thou upon the wine when it is red, [Prov. 23:31](/study/scriptures/ot/prov/23.31?lang=eng#p31). - wine maketh merry, [Eccl. 10:19](/study/scriptures/ot/eccl/10.19?lang=eng#p19). - thy wine mixed with water, [Isa. 1:22](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/1.22?lang=eng#p22). - continue until night, till wine inflame them, [Isa. 5:11](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/5.11?lang=eng#p11) ( [2 Ne. 15:11](/study/scriptures/bofm/2-ne/15.11?lang=eng#p11)). - They shall not drink wine, [Isa. 24:9](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/24.9?lang=eng#p9). - they also have erred through wine, [Isa. 28:7](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/28.7?lang=eng#p7). - drunken, but not with wine, [Isa. 29:9](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/29.9?lang=eng#p9) ( [2 Ne. 27:4](/study/scriptures/bofm/2-ne/27.4?lang=eng#p4)). - money, [Isa. 55:1](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/55.1?lang=eng#p1) ( [2 Ne. 9:50](/study/scriptures/bofm/2-ne/9.50?lang=eng#p50)). - ... Rechabites ... wine, [Jer. 35:5](/study/scriptures/ot/jer/35.5?lang=eng#p5). - they said, We will drink no wine, [Jer. 35:6](/study/scriptures/ot/jer/35.6?lang=eng#p6). - Neither shall any priest drink wine, [Ezek. 44:21](/study/scriptures/ot/ezek/44.21?lang=eng#p21). - he would not defile himself ... with the wine, [Dan. 1:8](/study/scriptures/ot/dan/1.8?lang=eng#p8). - look to other gods, and love flagons of wine, [Hosea 3:1](/study/scriptures/ot/hosea/3.1?lang=eng#p1). - Whoredom and wine ... take away the heart, [Hosea 4:11](/study/scriptures/ot/hosea/4.11?lang=eng#p11). - mountains shall
